BODY.intent: Codify intent-scoped discoverability for MetaBlooms RemoteLTM and prevent accidental broad SEO exposure; define deterministic raw URL contract and discovery fallbacks.

rules.title: Private Vocabulary Principle
rules.rule: Prefer system-specific identifiers (MetaBlooms, MIPS, DeltaCollapse, manifests/latest.json, ledger.ndjson, etc.) over popular commodity keywords in public repo metadata. Optimize for addressability by trusted actors, not broad discoverability.

rules.title: Never SEO This Repo
rules.rule: Do not add popular LLM-memory keywords to README, repository description, topics, or external posts. Avoid backlinks from high-traffic sources. If example text is needed, use MetaBlooms-specific lexicon only.

rules.title: Discovery Surface Contract
rules.rule: RemoteLTM must be recoverable in a cold-start chat without uploads by explicit URL or tool search discovery. Maintain at least one deterministic machine-readable bootstrap artifact at a stable path in the repo that contains canonical repo and raw_base URLs.

rules.title: Canonical Raw URL Contract
rules.rule: Canonical raw base is https://raw.githubusercontent.com/<owner>/<repo>/main. Canonical fetch targets: /manifests/bootstrap.json, /manifests/latest.json, /manifests/ledger.ndjson. Consumers must try bootstrap -> latest -> ledger fallback and verify JSON parseability.

lint.note: Forbidden terms are for README/metadata; internal docs may use them when necessary.

actions: Update README.md in repo root with MetaBlooms-specific lexicon and canonical raw URLs.
Add manifests/bootstrap.json referencing repo and raw base URLs.
Ensure manifests/latest.json and manifests/ledger.ndjson are committed and up to date.
migration.rollback: Revert README.md and remove manifests/bootstrap.json; keep existing manifests/latest.json and ledger.ndjson.
